title: Server Transfer Not Available?
body: I am checking the account button under the store and no server transfer is available. I saw it last week but it's not there currently. Help! My name change is available but that is all I see.

replies.body: Its already december and still,there is no server transfer
Same problem here, and can you tell me, can we transfer just for RP or can we pay in Blue essence?
new year already and transfers are still not available ,do they even know/care about this issue?! it seems not
Indeed, transfers are going to be down for a bit as we ramp up end of season rewards.

I think I found my answer. It has to do with preseason rewards. Transfers are blocked until the end of the November. RIP {{item:3070}} 

https://blogoflegends.com/2017/09/30/league-of-legends-account-transfers-hold/
